title: Database Sharding Strategy for User Service
description:
User database has reached 50M records and query performance is degrading. Proposal to implement horizontal sharding:

**Proposed Approach:**
- Shard by user_id hash (16 shards initially)
- Use consistent hashing for distribution
- Implement shard-aware connection pooling
- Add read replicas per shard

**Challenges Identified:**
- Cross-shard queries need aggregation layer
- Migration requires careful planning (zero downtime)
- Application changes needed in 8 microservices

**Performance Goals:**
- Query latency < 100ms (p95)
- Support 100M users
- 10x write throughput improvement

Architect2 has submitted initial design document with detailed implementation phases. Pending admin review before moving to implementation.
